`rhythmr` is part of the rethomics framework.
This README is a short explanation of the basics of `rhythmr`.
A [comprehensive documentation](https://rethomics.github.io) of rethomics is also available.

## Installation

```{r,eval=F}
library(devtools)
install_github("rethomics/behavr")
install_github("rethomics/rhythmr")
```
